content: materials & tools sugar pop yarn - 5 skeins in color #9840 rosehipster círculo e-4 3 5 mm crochet hook abbreviations chain = chain stitch double_crochet = double_crochet yo insert the hook yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo again pull through all loops decrease = decrease increase = increase single_crochet = single_crochet insert the hook yo pull up a loop yo again pull through all loops slip_stitch = slip_stitch insert the hook yo pull up a loop and pull through the loop on the hook st = stitch sts = stitches treble_crochet = treble_crochet yo twice insert the hook yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 2x yo again pull through all loops yo = yarn over pattern stitch = follow the corresponding diagram double_crochet panel = follow the diagram ribbing = follow the diagram
